Press [up arrow] for reverse thrusters.

multi.name: Multi

rules.e_descr: how much needs to be done to unlock ship (reach waves, reach missions, destroy asteroids...
how much needs to be done to unlock ship (reach waves, reach missions, destroy asteroids...

destructions.e_descr: The number of stages of destruction of the asteroid (a bullet hit the asteroid and it collapsed into 2 parts - this is the first destruction. A bullet hit one of the parts and it collapsed - this is the second destruction ...)

explosive_parts.e_descr: How many parts appear after each destruction. This is an array of values. The cell is randomly selected (integers as 1,2,3 ...)

part_hp.e_descr: The number of hit points for each part of the asteroid. How many times do you need to shoot an asteroid to destroy it in pieces.

move_speeds.e_descr: The speed of parts of asteroid. 'speed_1' is the speed of the first undamaged asteroid. Parameters in text fields are speed options that are randomly selected. (px / sec)

rot_speeds.e_descr: The speed of rotation of the parts of the asteroid. This is an array of values. A random cell is selected (integer values like 10, 60, 180 ..)

speed.e_descr: Array of enemy speeds. The cell is randomly selected. (integers like 60,70,100 ...)

lifetime.e_descr: An array of enemy lifetime values. After this time, the enemy disappears. The cell is randomly selected. (milliseconds like 4000,4100,4500 ...)

random_move_delay.e_descr: delay between deciding of change move angle. (milliseconds)

wait_before_first_shot.e_descr: The time between the spawn of the enemy and first shot. (milliseconds)

is_player_target.e_descr: The enemy will aim at the player

is_asteroid_target.e_descr: The enemy will aim at asteroids

kill_nearest_asteroid.e_descr: The enemy will only aim at the nearest asteroid

accuracy.e_descr: Firing accuracy of the enemy. It indicates how often the enemy will miss. (float 0..1)

accuracy_angles_range.e_descr: Shot sector of the enemy. Indicates the boundaries of the miss corners. (int)

is_dies_by_asteroids.e_descr: Should an enemy explode from an impact on an asteroid?

lives.e_descr: How many lives there're on the start

new_live_scores.e_descr: how many points is given a new life

first_asteroids_count.e_descr: how many asteroids appears on the first level

add_asteroids_count.e_descr: how many asteroids are added each next level

start_sound_delay.e_descr: each level you hear horror sounds that warn of an imminent UFO attack. This parameter indicates how often this sound sounds at the beginning of each level/ (milliseconds)

end_sound_delay.e_descr: parameter indicates how often this horror sound sounds at the 'end' of each level/ (milliseconds)

time_before_attack.e_descr: Attack - is period when UFO appears 100% each some delay. In this period we can listen to very frequent sound changing - horror sound. This parameter is linearly interpolated, so you need to specify only two values/ (milliseconds)

chance_spawn.e_descr: In original game on the first level after some time always! a large UFO appears, on the second level not always and on the next almost never. This parameter indicates the probability of a UFO appearing at the beginning of the level. This parameter is linearly interpolated. (float 0..1)

chance_ufo.e_descr: This parameter shows the spawn probability of each type of UFO at the beginning of the level. It is linearly interpolated. (integer >= 0)

wait_before_spawn.e_descr: How much time should pass before the first appearance of the UFO at the beginning of the level. Random (from, to). (milliseconds)

spawn_delay.e_descr: How much time should elapse between the reappearance of a UFO at a level. The numbers next to the text fields are seconds, and the numbers in the text fields are the probability of a dogo or other value. This can be represented as an array: ['4 sec', '6 sec', '6 sec', '6 sec', '8 sec', '10 sec', '10 sec'] from which a random cell is selected - the probability of falling out '6 sec' is higher than the rest. (> = 0)

attack_time_ufo.e_descr: This is the same as above, but these are the parameters for the UFO attack period.
